meta.title: My First Year of Software Engineering at the University of Waterloo
Securely Tunneling WireGuard VPN's UDP Traffic
meta.intro: It is sometimes not possible to establish a VPN connection due to a country or an organization's restrictions and their counter-measures. This article outlines how UDP traffic can be routed through a proxy to encrypt data, enabling the connection of a UDP-based VPN, such as those using the WireGuard protocol.

meta.title: DropNow: Peer to Peer Data Sharing Through WebRTC
meta.intro: Quite often we need to transfer files between devices. Unfortunately, even in the modern age of technology, we still have trouble doing this securely and conveniently. We explore the implementation of WebRTC in a web application to enable peer to peer data transfer.

meta.title: My LaTeX Note Taking Journey Through Calculus I
meta.intro: Throughout the course of my first Calculus course (grade 12 AP Calculus), I decided to write my notes neatly in LaTeX for future reference. That sparked a curiosity for the document preparation system, which I value greatly.
